Hello,      
         
I use Heritrix 1.10.1.         
How I can set the re=
gular expression to specify which file types to         
fetch (for example=
, only "txt" and "html" files)?

- tab "Submodules=
" in Web console -> "pre-fetch-processors" section        
-> Preselector -=
> <myFilter>, OR        
- tab "Submodules" in Web console -> "fetch-proces=
sors" section ->        
HTML -> <myFilter> ?        
        
2) All of ty=
pes org.archive.crawler.filter.* are Deprecated, so I        
should use or=
g.archive.crawler.deciderules.DecidingFilter type, and        
define my de=
cide-rules (for example,        
org.archive.crawler.deciderules.MatchesReg=

class=3D"org.archive.crawler.prefetch.=

boolean>

n name=3D"block-all">false</boolean>

></string>

t>     
    
So, what do mean these lines:    
 <string name=3D"block-by-re=
gexp"></string>

=
Can I define here a RegExp to restrict files types to fetch?
